name: Ocean Is Home 2: Survival
description:
Ocean is Home - this is a free 3D action survival simulator with RPG elements, which takes you to the archipelago of picturesque islands, almost detached from civilization. A huge open world will not let you get bored.
Survive in the wild, get food hunting and fishing, craft tools and weapons and build your own unique home.
Use full freedom of action to survive, explore and travel! A lot of islands with different kinds of resources, loot and hazards are available for explore! With each new island, you will discover new opportunities, as well as new secrets and challenges. Will you survive in this desolate place? Can you solve all it secrets? Will this endless ocean become home for you?

OWN ISLAND!
The whole island is at your disposal. Here you can build and develop your base to gain access to new technologies, trade, prepare for travel and seizures of other islands. But do not forget to protect your island.

EXPLORING OF NEW TERRITORIES!
Traveling through the archipelago, you can find many different types of resources, loot, knowledge and much more! However, discovering new islands may not be as easy as getting to them.

SECRETS AND SECRETS!
Far islands can hide many interesting things. An abandoned bunker full of zombies; untold treasures; deadly traps or life raft! What other secrets can you find?

FROM SIMPLE SURVIVAL TO PROSPERITY!
The first enemies will be hunger and thirst, but the path of your development goes far ahead. Soon you will be able to create more tools and clothes, craft advanced weapons, engage in farming and livestock, even build special production buildings!

MY HOME IS MY CASTLE!
Build your unique home from a variety of different details. Use different materials with different properties. Arrange furniture, hang pictures, discover new elements and experiment with an advanced system of free building!

KNOWLEDGE IS THE KEY TO SUCCESS!
Improve your character's skills and abilities! This will allow you not only to carry out the usual actions faster and more efficiently, but also will open access to special perks, which gives additional opportunities.

DRIVER'S LICENSE!
You have the opportunity to use several types of vehicles, such as cars and boats. At the same time, these are not just vehicles, they can carry loads, repair them and improve them!

Download free Ocean Is Home: Survival Island - 3D Survival Action Simulator with elements of exploration, construction and farm.

If you have any questions or suggestions on the game, please write to our support email or facebook group.
Support email: oceanishomeofficial@gmail.com
